name: ImageJ threshold apply
title: ImageJ threshold apply
description: This plugin applies a constant or manual threshold to an input collection.
author: Nick Schaub (nick.schaub@nih.gov), Anjali Taneja, Benjamin Houghton (benjamin.houghton@axleinfo.com), Najib Ishaq (najib.ishaq@nih.gov)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: inpDir
inputs.description: Collection to be processed by this plugin

inputs.name: threshold
inputs.description: The threshold value to be applied to the input

ui.title: inpDir
ui.description: Collection to be processed by this plugin

ui.title: threshold
ui.description: The threshold value to be applied to the input
